level.heading: PROFESSIONAL, ADMINISTRATIVE AND OFFICIAL LEAVE (ยง 14-7122)

level.text: Professional, administrative, and official leave shall constitute the following:
The Authority may grant paid professional leave to employees to participate in seminars, institutes, examinations and other activities away from the Authority directly related to work.
Administrative leave is officially approved excused absence from duty without loss of pay and without charge to leave.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 42 DCR 6914, 6928 (December 8, 1995).
